original_title: Wild Card: The Downfall of a Radio Loudmouth
overview: The rise and fall of prominent New York sports radio personality Craig Carton. Through a series of candid interviews with Carton, the film reveals how the radio hostâ€™s secret insatiable gambling addiction, financed by an illicit ticket-broking business, brought his career to a sudden halt when he was arrested by FBI agents and charged with conspiracy, wire fraud, and securities fraud in 2017.
title: Wild Card: The Downfall of a Radio Loudmouth
